headline.main: CIVIL COMMISSION FOR EUROPE READY; Advisory Group of 3 Big Powers Will Determine Control of Lands to Be Invaded

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 1 -- The European Advisory Commission will start work soon on the way in which civil affairs are to be handled in France, Belgium, the Netherlands and Norway after the invasion of the Continent from the west, it was learned tonight.
abstract: comm to study civil affairs adm transfer from mil forces liberating occupied areas to natl govts
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 1 -- The European Advisory Commission will start work soon on the way in which civil affairs are to be handled in France, Belgium, the Netherlands and Norway after the invasion of the Continent from the west, it was learned tonight....
